title: What is Factor Tested Device ?
content:
My Pixel 2 XL is broken and it is under warranty. So I send for diagnosis and the team said they can't fix my device, instead they can give a "Factory Tested Device" for a particular quotation. 

What is meant by 'Factory Tested' Device ? Does it means an Used mobile ? I can say for sure that it's not a Brand New one. I tried to get answer for this from Google but they are not telling directly, they kept saying Factory Tested. 

I have to decide whether I should spend 18,000 INR for Factory Tested Pixel 2 XL or should I get new Pixel Phone based on the meaning of 'Factory Tested'
